summary: The Ilyushin Il-76 is a large airplane made in the Soviet Union. It's used for many things, like carrying heavy things to places with bad roads. The military uses it too, for refueling planes or as a command center. It can carry big, heavy cargo and land on unpaved runways, which is helpful in remote areas. It's also used for emergency evacuations and helping people after disasters. Some Il-76 planes are even used for firefighting and training astronauts.
title: Ilyushin Il-76
